Wow, it's unbelievable that in this day and age morons still keep posting this shit about 544 vs 720p.  People are so eager to complain; it's endemic.  winto_bungle, subtract 2 large black bars from 720p and you end up with 544 horizontal lines.  Do some research before you start your bitching.  It's called "original aspect ratio," your TV is likely 16x9 and the movie is recorded at 2.35:1.  aoloffline, another killer release as always!  Cheers.
@winto.  If it was kept at the 1280 x 720 ratio there would be black bars included in this release which would just be a waste.  What really matters in the 1280.
